stuy
Class FileIO

java.lang.Object
  stuy.FileIO

public class FileIO
extends java.lang.Object

Reads and parses text files on the cRIO. This is useful for quickly adjusting tuning values using FTP, such as for PID. Place the '#' character before comments.

Author:
Kevin Wang

Constructor Detail

FileIO

public FileIO()
Method Detail

getArray

public static double[] getArray(java.lang.String filename)
Create an array of doubles using values in a text file. Each line in the file corresponds to one element in the array.

Parameters:
filename - The name of the file to read.
Returns:
The array of values in the file.

reportError

public static void reportError(java.lang.String context,
                               java.lang.Exception e,
                               java.lang.String customMessage)
Reports errors giving information on which class the error was in along with an error message from the catch block.

Parameters:
context - States in which class the error has occured.
e - Name of the exception.
customMessage - Displays the custom message in the catch block.

writeLog

public static void writeLog()
Records a log of exceptions to competion.log.
